dishes.name: Village Rice
dishes.description: Tasty Village Rice cooked with palm oil and native spices.

dishes.name: Jollof Rice
dishes.description: Spicy Nigerian Jollof rice served with fried plantains.

dishes.name: Fried Rice
dishes.description: Delicious Nigerian fried rice with vegetables and proteins.

dishes.name: Ofada Rice
dishes.description: Local Ofada rice served with spicy ayamase sauce.

dishes.name: Coconut Rice
dishes.description: Fragrant coconut rice cooked with fresh coconut milk.

dishes.name: Palm Oil Rice
dishes.description: Traditional rice dish prepared with palm oil and assorted meats.

dishes.name: Tuwo Shinkafa
dishes.description: Northern Nigerian rice dish served with spicy soup.

dishes.name: Rice and Beans
dishes.description: Nigerian rice dish made with katsu (chicken breasts) and seasoned with spices.

dishes.name: Nigerian Vegetable Salad
dishes.description: A rich mix of cabbage, carrots, cucumbers, boiled eggs, and baked beans.

dishes.name: Coleslaw
dishes.description: Classic Nigerian coleslaw made with shredded cabbage, carrots, and creamy dressing.

dishes.name: Avocado Salad
dishes.description: Fresh avocado slices with lettuce, tomatoes, onions, and light dressing.

dishes.name: Beans and Corn Salad (Ewa ati Agbado)
dishes.description: A nutritious mix of cooked beans, sweet corn, tomatoes, and spices.

dishes.name: Chicken Salad
dishes.description: Grilled chicken breast served with fresh lettuce, tomatoes, and cucumber.

dishes.name: Shrimp Salad
dishes.description: Spicy shrimp tossed with crunchy vegetables and light dressing.

dishes.name: Fruit Salad
dishes.description: A refreshing mix of watermelon, pineapple, banana, and apple.

dishes.name: Plantain Salad
dishes.description: Fried plantain cubes mixed with vegetables and light dressing.

dishes.name: Grilled Chicken
dishes.description: Well-marinated and grilled chicken with a smoky flavor.

dishes.name: Peppered Turkey
dishes.description: Spicy turkey wings coated in a rich pepper sauce.

dishes.name: Goat Meat Peppersoup
dishes.description: Traditional Nigerian pepper soup made with tender goat meat and aromatic spices.

dishes.name: Fried Fish
dishes.description: Crispy fried fish served with a side of spicy sauce.

dishes.name: Suya (Spicy Grilled Meat)
dishes.description: Popular Nigerian street food made from grilled spicy beef skewers.

dishes.name: Bole and Fish
dishes.description: Grilled plantain (Bole) served with roasted fish and spicy sauce.

dishes.name: Isi Ewu (Goat Head Delicacy)
dishes.description: A rich, spicy dish made from goat head, palm oil sauce, and local spices.

dishes.name: Nkwobi
dishes.description: Delicious cow foot dish prepared with spicy palm oil sauce.

dishes.name: Egusi Soup
dishes.description: Rich, thick soup made from melon seeds, vegetables, and assorted meats.

dishes.name: Oha Soup
dishes.description: Traditional Eastern Nigerian soup made with oha leaves and thickened with cocoyam.

dishes.name: Banga Soup
dishes.description: Palm nut soup cooked with local spices and served with fresh fish or meat.

dishes.name: Afang Soup
dishes.description: A delicious, vegetable-based soup made with water leaves and afang leaves.

dishes.name: Edikaikong Soup
dishes.description: A highly nutritious soup made from ugu and water leaves, often served with assorted meats.

dishes.name: Ewedu Soup
dishes.description: A slimy-textured soup made from jute leaves, often paired with gbegiri and amala.

dishes.name: Ogbono Soup
dishes.description: Thick, draw soup made from ground ogbono seeds and cooked with meat and vegetables.

dishes.name: Nsala Soup
dishes.description: White soup made with fresh fish, uziza leaves, and thickened with yam.

dishes.name: Pounded Yam
dishes.description: Smooth and stretchy swallow made from boiled yam, pounded to perfection.

dishes.name: Garri (Eba)
dishes.description: A popular swallow made from cassava flakes, served with soups.

dishes.name: Amala
dishes.description: Yoruba delicacy made from yam flour, soft and perfect with ewedu soup.

dishes.name: Fufu
dishes.description: A smooth and sticky swallow made from fermented cassava, best paired with rich soups.

dishes.name: Semovita
dishes.description: A smooth and filling swallow made from semolina flour, served with any Nigerian soup.

dishes.name: Wheat Meal
dishes.description: A healthy and fibrous alternative to traditional swallows, made from whole wheat.

dishes.name: Lafun
dishes.description: A white, slightly fermented swallow made from cassava flour, popular in Yoruba cuisine.

dishes.name: Tuwon Shinkafa
dishes.description: A Northern Nigerian swallow made from mashed rice, often served with Miyan Kuka.

dishes.name: Zobo
dishes.description: A refreshing hibiscus drink infused with pineapple, ginger, and cloves.

dishes.name: Kunu
dishes.description: A traditional Northern Nigerian drink made from millet or corn with a spicy kick.

dishes.name: Palm Wine
dishes.description: A natural and mildly alcoholic drink tapped from palm trees, enjoyed fresh.

dishes.name: Chapman
dishes.description: A popular Nigerian cocktail made with Angostura bitters, grenadine, and soft drinks.

dishes.name: Tiger Nut Milk (Kunu Aya)
dishes.description: A creamy, nutritious drink made from tiger nuts, dates, and coconut.

dishes.name: Fura da Nono
dishes.description: A Northern Nigerian drink made from fermented cow milk and millet dough.

dishes.name: Agbo
dishes.description: A herbal drink made from medicinal roots, leaves, and spices for health benefits.

dishes.name: Soya Milk
dishes.description: A nutritious and dairy-free drink made from blended and strained soybeans.

dishes.name: Meat Pie
dishes.description: A flaky pastry filled with minced meat, potatoes, and carrots.

dishes.name: Fish Roll
dishes.description: A crispy rolled pastry stuffed with seasoned fish filling.

dishes.name: Chin Chin
dishes.description: A crunchy, deep-fried pastry made from flour, milk, and sugar.

dishes.name: Puff Puff
dishes.description: A soft and fluffy deep-fried dough snack with a slightly sweet taste.

dishes.name: Buns
dishes.description: A denser and crunchier version of puff puff, enjoyed as a snack.

dishes.name: Scotch Egg
dishes.description: A boiled egg wrapped in sausage meat, coated in breadcrumbs, and deep-fried.

dishes.name: Egg Roll
dishes.description: A boiled egg wrapped in a slightly sweet dough and deep-fried.

dishes.name: Donkwa
dishes.description: A peanut-based Nigerian snack made from groundnuts, sugar, and spices.
